text: Everybody's Fine is a 2009 comedy-drama movie. It is about secrets and dysfunctional family. Robert De Niro plays Frank Goode. Drew Barrymore plays Rosie. Kate Beckinsale plays Amy. The movie got mixed reviews from the critics. It was released in December 2009. Category:2009 comedy-drama movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:Movies directed by Kirk Jones
title: Everybody's Fine
